bibl.title: Receipt, Thomas Cadwalader Jr. in Trenton, N.J. from Miss Meredith,1824 June 25
bibl.note: Insurance Company of North America Records, 1792 December 1 - 1843 February 18

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: Trenton Jan y. 29th 1824 Miss Elizabeth Meredith To Daniel Phillips Dr. To 35 Shingles and 42 fr 3/4 braids work 1.25 Pan_boards 36
$1.31 1.61 $2.92 April Rec.d Payment of Thomas Cadwallader Esq.r Daneil Phillips

Thomas Cadwalader junior of the City of Trenton being duly term accending to law doth defer and say _ that the within Price per paid by him for the Miss Meredith it say for repairs dine to them have ritual on received that continued in the City of & State of New Jersy increased at the office of the Insurance Company of North America in Policy no 8077 fudamase sustained by said house fire in the month of January back -

p.unclear: sierra such eash or before me thru 25 here 1824 Thomas Cadwalader

div.p: Loss to Miss Merediths Home in Trenton paid June 25 1824 $2.92
